text:
Hey <@U02FZCR06CE> — a few tools already exist for this.

One of them is a tool called <https://www.npmjs.com/package/@spingroup/parachute/v/1.0.1|Parachute>. — I built this tool last year — but I don’t mainain it because I found a different tool that was further in production that does the same thing with more features.

That is called <https://github.com/iGoMoon/HubSpot-tools/tree/main/packages/HubSpot-fields-js|HubSpot Fields JS> Both have the feature that youre looking for.

HubSpot Fields JS comes with an API that allows you to quickly write a fields.json file in a more readable and user friendly way.

Parachute just allows you to separate JSON files and combine them on compile using webpack.
